trans-unit.resname: CMM·704 | Zhulodok, Void Gorger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zhulodok, Void Gorger
trans-unit.target: 虚空饕体祖禄铎

trans-unit.resname: CMM·704 | Zhulodok, Void Gorger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Colorless spells you cast from your hand with mana value 7 or greater have "Cascade, cascade." (When you cast one, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)
trans-unit.target: 你从你手上施放之法术力值等于或大于7的无色咒语具有「倾曳，倾曳」。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·705 | Anikthea, Hand of Erebos | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anikthea, Hand of Erebos
trans-unit.target: 厄睿柏斯之手阿尼克霞

trans-unit.resname: CMM·705 | Anikthea, Hand of Erebos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: CMM·705 | Anikthea, Hand of Erebos | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other enchantment creatures you control have menace.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他结界生物具有威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·705 | Anikthea, Hand of Erebos | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Anikthea enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 3/3 black Zombie creature in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每当阿尼克霞进战场或攻击时，将至多一张目标非灵气结界牌从你的坟墓场放逐。派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但它是3/3黑色灵俑生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commodore Guff
trans-unit.target: 古夫准将
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put a loyalty counter on another target planeswalker you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，在另一个目标由你操控的鹏洛客上放置一个忠诚指示物。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Create a 1/1 red Wizard creature token with "{T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast a planeswalker spell."
trans-unit.target: +1：派出一个1/1红色法术师衍生生物，且具有「{T}：加{R}。此法术力只能用来施放鹏洛客咒语。」
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: You draw X cards and CARDNAME deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: -3：你抓X张牌且CARDNAME向每位对手各造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的鹏洛客数量。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可用作指挥官。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·707 | Sliver Gravemother | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sliver Gravemother
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖坟母

trans-unit.resname: CMM·707 | Sliver Gravemother | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The "legend rule" doesn't apply to Slivers you control.
trans-unit.target: 「传奇规则」不对由你操控的裂片妖生效。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·707 | Sliver Gravemother | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each Sliver creature card in your graveyard has encore {X}, where X is its mana value.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的每张裂片妖生物牌均具有返场{X}，X为其法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·707 | Sliver Gravemother | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Encore {5} ({5}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 返场{5}

trans-unit.resname: CMM·708 | Omarthis, Ghostfire Initiate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omarthis, Ghostfire Initiate
trans-unit.target: 灵火新手欧玛迪斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·708 | Omarthis, Ghostfire Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·708 | Omarthis, Ghostfire Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on another colorless creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Omarthis.
trans-unit.target: 每当你在另一个无色生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，你可以在欧玛迪斯上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·708 | Omarthis, Ghostfire Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Omarthis dies, manifest a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the number of counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 当欧玛迪斯死去时，显化你牌库顶若干牌，其数量等同于其上的指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·709 | Leori, Sparktouched Hunter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leori, Sparktouched Hunter
trans-unit.target: 触火花猎狮雷奥力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·709 | Leori, Sparktouched Hunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·709 | Leori, Sparktouched Hunter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose a planeswalker type. Until end of turn, whenever you activate an ability of a planeswalker of that type, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copies.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成伤害时，选择一种鹏洛客类别。直到回合结束，每当你起动为该类别之鹏洛客的异能时，复制该异能。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·710 | Narci, Fable Singer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Narci, Fable Singer
trans-unit.target: 寓言歌者娜尔提

trans-unit.resname: CMM·710 | Narci, Fable Singer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: CMM·710 | Narci, Fable Singer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice an enchantment, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个结界时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·710 | Narci, Fable Singer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that Saga's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的传纪之最终章节异能结算时，每位对手各失去X点生命且你获得X点生命，X为该传纪的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·711 | Rukarumel, Biologist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rukarumel, Biologist
trans-unit.target: 生物学家陆卡陆梅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·711 | Rukarumel, Biologist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·711 | Rukarumel, Biologist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Slivers you control and nontoken creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other creature types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖和由你操控且非衍生物的生物均额外具有所选类别。由你操控的生物咒语和由你拥有且不在战场上的生物牌也是如此。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·711 | Rukarumel, Biologist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：派出一个1/1无色裂片妖衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·712 | Abstruse Archaic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Abstruse Archaic
trans-unit.target: 究奥古旅人

trans-unit.resname: CMM·712 | Abstruse Archaic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·712 | Abstruse Archaic | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control from a colorless source. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：复制目标由你操控且来源为无色的起动式或触发式异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·713 | Calamity of the Titans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Calamity of the Titans
trans-unit.target: 巨物致灾

trans-unit.resname: CMM·713 | Calamity of the Titans | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上展示一张无色生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·713 | Calamity of the Titans | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile each creature and planeswalker with mana value less than the revealed card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有法术力值比所展示之牌小的生物和鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·714 | Desecrate Reality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Desecrate Reality
trans-unit.target: 亵渎实界

trans-unit.resname: CMM·714 | Desecrate Reality | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each opponent, exile up to one target permanent that player controls with an even mana value. (Zero is even.)
trans-unit.target: 为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控且法术力值为偶数的永久物。（零是偶数。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·714 | Desecrate Reality | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Adamant — If at least three colorless mana was spent to cast this spell, return a permanent card with an odd mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 固色～如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点无色法术力，则将一张法术力值为奇数的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·715 | Flayer of Loyalties | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flayer of Loyalties
trans-unit.target: 夺忠恶体

trans-unit.resname: CMM·715 | Flayer of Loyalties | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it has base power and toughness 10/10, and gains trample, annihilator 2, and haste.\nAnnihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)\nTrample
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。直到回合结束，它的基础力量与防御力为10/10，且获得践踏、歼灭2与敏捷异能。\n践踏，歼灭2

trans-unit.resname: CMM·716 | Rise of the Eldrazi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise of the Eldrazi
trans-unit.target: 奥札奇再起

trans-unit.resname: CMM·716 | Rise of the Eldrazi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·716 | Rise of the Eldrazi | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target permanent. Target player draws four cards. Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标永久物。目标牌手抓四张牌。于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·716 | Rise of the Eldrazi | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·717 | Skittering Cicada | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skittering Cicada
trans-unit.target: 掠行鸣蝉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·717 | Skittering Cicada | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: CMM·717 | Skittering Cicada | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may cast colorless spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将无色咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·717 | Skittering Cicada | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a colorless spell, until end of turn, CARDNAME gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放无色咒语时，直到回合结束，CARDNAME获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·718 | Ugin's Mastery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ugin's Mastery
trans-unit.target: 乌金的掌控

trans-unit.resname: CMM·718 | Ugin's Mastery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a colorless creature spell, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放无色生物咒语时，显化你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·718 | Ugin's Mastery | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with creatures with total power 6 or greater, you may turn a face-down creature you control face up.
trans-unit.target: 每当你以力量总和等于或大于6的生物攻击时，你可以将一个由你操控且牌面朝下的生物翻回正面。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·719 | Battle at the Helvault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Battle at the Helvault
trans-unit.target: 狱窖之战
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·719 | Battle at the Helvault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。）
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·719 | Battle at the Helvault | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I, II — For each player, exile up to one target non-Saga, nonland permanent that player controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: I, II—为每位牌手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控且既非传纪也非地的永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·719 | Battle at the Helvault | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: III — Create Avacyn, a legendary 8/8 white Angel creature token with flying, vigilance, and indestructible.
trans-unit.target: III—派出传奇衍生生物艾维欣，其为8/8白色，具飞行、警戒与不灭异能的天使。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·720 | Boon of the Spirit Realm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boon of the Spirit Realm
trans-unit.target: 灵界恩泽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·720 | Boon of the Spirit Realm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a blessing counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个祝福指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·720 | Boon of the Spirit Realm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each blessing counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME上每有一个祝福指示物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·721 | Gatewatch Beacon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gatewatch Beacon
trans-unit.target: 守护者信标

trans-unit.resname: CMM·721 | Gatewatch Beacon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three loyalty counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个忠诚指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·721 | Gatewatch Beacon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·721 | Gatewatch Beacon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a planeswalker enters the battlefield under your control, if CARDNAME has loyalty counters on it, you may move a loyalty counter from CARDNAME onto that planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个鹏洛客在你的操控下进战场时，若CARDNAME上有忠诚指示物，则你可以将CARDNAME上的一个忠诚指示物移至该鹏洛客上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·722 | Onakke Oathkeeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Onakke Oathkeeper
trans-unit.target: 欧纳克守誓魔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·722 | Onakke Oathkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each creature they control that's attacking a planeswalker you control.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{1}，否则它不能攻击由你操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·722 | Onakke Oathkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}{W}, Exile CARDNAME from your graveyard: Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}{W}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：将目标鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·723 | Ondu Spiritdancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ondu Spiritdancer
trans-unit.target: 昂度灵舞者

trans-unit.resname: CMM·723 | Ondu Spiritdancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a token that's a copy of it. Do this only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，你可以派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。每回合只能如此作一次。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·724 | Regal Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Regal Sliver
trans-unit.target: 威严裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·724 | Regal Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, Slivers you control get +1/+1 until end of turn if you're the monarch. Otherwise, you become the monarch."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有「当此生物进战场时，如果你是君主，则由你操控的裂片妖得+1/+1直到回合结束。若否，则你成为君主。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·725 | Teyo, Geometric Tactician | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 几何策士泰佑
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·725 | Teyo, Geometric Tactician | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 0/4 white Wall creature token with defender and flying.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个0/4白色，具守军和飞行异能的墙衍生生物。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·725 | Teyo, Geometric Tactician | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: You and target opponent each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: +1：你和目标对手各抓一张牌。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·725 | Teyo, Geometric Tactician | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Choose left or right. Until your next turn, each player may attack only the nearest opponent in the last chosen direction and planeswalkers controlled by that opponent.
trans-unit.target: -2：选择左边或右边。直到你的下一个回合，每位牌手都只能攻击最后所选方向最近的对手和由该对手操控的鹏洛客。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·726 | Sparkshaper Visionary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sparkshaper Visionary
trans-unit.target: 塑火花幻视师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·726 | Sparkshaper Visionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose any number of target planeswalkers you control. Until end of turn, they become 3/3 blue Bird creatures with flying, hexproof, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, scry 1." (They're no longer planeswalkers. Loyalty abilities can still be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，选择任意数量目标由你操控的鹏洛客。直到回合结束，它们成为3/3蓝色的鸟生物，且具有飞行、辟邪与「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，占卜1。」（它们不再是鹏洛客。仍能起动其忠诚异能。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·727 | Taunting Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Taunting Sliver
trans-unit.target: 引战裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·727 | Taunting Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, goad target creature an opponent controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有「当此生物进战场时，煽惑目标由对手操控的生物。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·728 | Titan of Littjara | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Titan of Littjara
trans-unit.target: 利雅拉泰坦

trans-unit.resname: CMM·728 | Titan of Littjara | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·728 | Titan of Littjara | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME额外具有该类别。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·728 | Titan of Littjara | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may draw a card for each other creature you control that shares a creature type with it. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，你可以抓若干牌，其数量等同于由你操控且与它具共通生物类别的其他生物数量。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·729 | Vronos, Masked Inquisitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vronos, Masked Inquisitor
trans-unit.target: 覆面判官伏罗诺斯
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·729 | Vronos, Masked Inquisitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to two other target planeswalkers you control phase out at the beginning of the next end step. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.)
trans-unit.target: +1：在下一个结束步骤开始时，至多两个其他目标由你操控的鹏洛客跃离。（直到你的下一个回合，它们及贴附于其上的所有东西都视作不存在。）
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·729 | Vronos, Masked Inquisitor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: For each opponent, return up to one target nonland permanent that player controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: -2：为每位对手各进行以下流程～将至多一个目标由该牌手操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·729 | Vronos, Masked Inquisitor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: Target artifact you control becomes a 9/9 Construct artifact creature and gains vigilance, indestructible, and "This creature can't be blocked."
trans-unit.target: -7：目标由你操控的神器成为9/9组构体神器生物且获得警戒、不灭与「此生物不能被阻挡。」
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·730 | Cacophony Unleashed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cacophony Unleashed
trans-unit.target: 邪调现世

trans-unit.resname: CMM·730 | Cacophony Unleashed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, destroy all nonenchantment creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则消灭所有非结界生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·730 | Cacophony Unleashed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a legendary 6/6 Nightmare God creature with menace and deathtouch. It's still an enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为传奇的6/6梦魇／神生物，且具有威慑与死触异能。它仍然是结界。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·731 | Demon of Fate's Design | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demon of Fate's Design
trans-unit.target: 定命恶魔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·731 | Demon of Fate's Design | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: CMM·731 | Demon of Fate's Design | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an enchantment spell by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以藉由「支付等同于其法术力值数量的生命，而不支付其法术力费用」之方式施放结界咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·731 | Demon of Fate's Design | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another enchantment: CARDNAME gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed enchantment's mana value.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，牺牲另一个结界：CARDNAME得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为所牺牲结界的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·732 | Ghoulish Impetus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghoulish Impetus
trans-unit.target: 尸鬼促动

trans-unit.resname: CMM·732 | Ghoulish Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: CMM·732 | Ghoulish Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has deathtouch, and is goaded.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+1/+1，具有死触异能，且已煽惑。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·732 | Ghoulish Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature dies, return CARDNAME to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当所结附的生物死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时将CARDNAME移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·733 | Lazotep Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lazotep Sliver
trans-unit.target: 拉佐特裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·733 | Lazotep Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have afflict 2. (Whenever a creature with afflict 2 becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有折磨2。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·733 | Lazotep Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken Sliver you control dies, amass Slivers 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Sliver. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Sliver Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的裂片妖死去时，囤兵裂片妖2。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·734 | Capricious Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Capricious Sliver
trans-unit.target: 任性裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·734 | Capricious Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·735 | Chandra, Legacy of Fire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Legacy of Fire
trans-unit.target: 烈焰传承茜卓
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·735 | Chandra, Legacy of Fire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, CARDNAME deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的鹏洛客数量。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·735 | Chandra, Legacy of Fire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Add {R} for each planeswalker you control.
trans-unit.target: +1：你每操控一个鹏洛客，便加{R}。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·735 | Chandra, Legacy of Fire | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [0]: Remove a loyalty counter from each of any number of permanents you control. Exile that many cards from the top of your library. You may play them this turn.
trans-unit.target: 0：从任意数量由你操控的永久物上各移去一个忠诚指示物。从你的牌库顶放逐等量的牌。本回合中，你可以使用这些牌。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: CMM·736 | Descendants' Fury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Descendants' Fury
trans-unit.target: 后代怒火

trans-unit.resname: CMM·736 | Descendants' Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice one of them. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with the sacrificed creature. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以牺牲其中一个。若你如此作，则从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张与所牺牲生物具共通生物类别的生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·737 | Guff Rewrites History | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guff Rewrites History
trans-unit.target: 古夫修史

trans-unit.resname: CMM·737 | Guff Rewrites History | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each player, choose target nonenchantment, nonland permanent that player controls. Those permanents' owners shuffle them into their libraries. Each player who controlled one of those permanents exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card, then puts the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order. Each player may cast the nonland card they exiled without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 为每位牌手各选择一个由其操控、既非结界也非地的永久物。这些永久物的拥有者各将它们洗入其牌库。对每位操控过前述永久物之一的牌手而言，该牌手从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于其牌库底。每位牌手各可以施放其放逐的非地牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·738 | Jaya's Phoenix | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jaya's Phoenix
trans-unit.target: 雅亚的凤凰

trans-unit.resname: CMM·738 | Jaya's Phoenix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: CMM·738 | Jaya's Phoenix | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, copy the next loyalty ability you activate this turn when you activate it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手或鹏洛客造成战斗伤害，本回合中，当你下一次起动忠诚异能时，复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·738 | Jaya's Phoenix | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放鹏洛客咒语时，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·739 | Composer of Spring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Composer of Spring
trans-unit.target: 迎春作曲家

trans-unit.resname: CMM·739 | Composer of Spring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. If you control six or more enchantments, instead you may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。若你操控六个或更多结界，则改为你可以将一张生物或地牌从你手上横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·740 | For the Ancestors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: For the Ancestors
trans-unit.target: 为了先祖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·740 | For the Ancestors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal any number of cards of the chosen type from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中任意数量为该类别的牌，并将所展示的牌置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·740 | For the Ancestors | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.resname: CMM·741 | Hatchery Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hatchery Sliver
trans-unit.target: 孵卵裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·741 | Hatchery Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Replicate {1}{G} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)

trans-unit.resname: CMM·741 | Hatchery Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each Sliver spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每个你施放的裂片妖咒语均具有覆诵异能。其覆诵费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Nyxborn Behemoth
trans-unit.target: 天裔贝西摩斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·742 | Nyxborn Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature enchantments you control.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为由你操控之非生物结界的法术力值总和。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·742 | Nyxborn Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: {1}{G}, Sacrifice another enchantment: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}，牺牲另一个结界：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a colorless spell that you cast from your hand.
